meta.job_title: Vice President of Community Health Center Performance

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development and execution of strategy to ensure success of Aledade as an enterprise-wide solution for CHCs in value-based care work.
Develop a pipeline for product success for CHCs and provide key direction to health equity-driven performance strategy and population health interventions within Aledade’s CHC portfolio.
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure seamless integration with Aledade’s portfolio and serve as key company advocate for strategy related to CHCs.
Provide key direction to health equity-driven performance strategy and population health interventions within Aledade’s CHC portfolio.
Lead a cross-functional working group to develop a practice model for CHC population health interventions and inform Aledade’s Medicaid and Medicare Advantage payer contracting strategy.
Assume responsibility for all aspects of performance of CHCs in value-based care metrics and develop an enterprise-wide strategy for improving risk stratification and care quality within CHCs.

Collaborate with Product Marketing on innovative ways to capture mindshare and enhance CHC engagement in value-based care and develop and lead an advisory committee made up of CHC leadership representatives who can provide regular feedback.
Investigate the role of Medicare-Medicaid (dual) eligible patients in CHC ACO contract success and define the tools and analytics needed to support and retain this customer type.
Develop separate onboarding materials for employed physicians/NPs/PAs with sensitivity to the training needs that our customers desire, and the time and tech constraints the employed providers have.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree with 15+ years experience in healthcare. Master’s degree or other advanced degree(s) in business, health administration and/or public policy or other relevant fields preferred.
